instructions: Open the phone app on your Android phone. Tap the three dots to open the menu and select Settings . In the phone app settings, select Blocked Numbers. In the blocked numbers window, select Add a Number to add any number to the blocked numbers list in your phone. You can add an unlimited number of phone numbers to your blocked list using this approach.

Open the phone app on your iPhone and tap Recents from the bottom menu. Press the blue i icon on the right side of the phone number you want to block and tap Block this Caller . You'll need to confirm that you want to block the number. Once you do, you can confirm it's on the list by opening your iPhone Settings and tapping Phone , then tap Call Blocking & Identification . This is also where you can tap Block Contact to block anyone on your contacts list if you want to.
